title: Koi Nami Chromas?
body: Hey dudes, since yesterday morning I have not been able to use my Koi  {{champion:267}}  chromas. I do not think this is just me, because the Store does not even show that they exist! [EDIT: they do show the Koi Nami chromas and chroma pack individually, but not on the skin itself. Like the little boxes you click] I spent real money on these beautiful colors and hope that I could get a full refund or my colors back! Any  suggestions? Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey fellow Nami player! ^-^ 

I have a few questions for you! Is this occurring every game for you? Is this on LCU or the legacy client? Would you be able to provide a screenshot?

Thanks in advance! <3

It occured in Normals, aram, and Ranked draft! I am on the LCU client! And I it has been weird. I reinstalled yesterday and think it might have just been some weird thing that did not update with the patch!
Rgr! Thanks for the update! If you're seeing it again, please feel free to poke this thread again. :)
